text: Shenzhen University (Traditional Chinese: 深圳大學; Simplified Chinese: 深圳大学) is a public university in Shenzhen, Guangdong Province, China. Founded in 1983, it located in Nanshan district and has two campuses: Yuehai and Lihu. == Famous student == * Ma Huateng, Chinese businessman, founder of Tencent. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in the People's Republic of China Category:Shenzhen
title: Shenzhen University
